items.title: Once high-flying Bluebird Bio sells itself to private equity after tough times for the gene therapy maker
items.content: Bluebird Bio will sell itself to private equity firms Carlyle and SK Capital for about $30 million, the company said Friday.
items.contentSnippet: Bluebird Bio will sell itself to private equity firms Carlyle and SK Capital for about $30 million, the company said Friday.

items.title: UnitedHealth's rough stretch continues, with buyouts, a reported DOJ probe and a 23% drop in three months
items.content: It extends a tumultuous period for UnitedHealth marked by the killing of a top executive, a costly cyberattack against its subsidiary and high medical costs.
items.contentSnippet: It extends a tumultuous period for UnitedHealth marked by the killing of a top executive, a costly cyberattack against its subsidiary and high medical costs.

items.title: IMAX CEO expects $1.2 billion in box office receipts this year, the best in the company's history
items.content: Aiding IMAX's lofty box office goals is the Chinese title "Ne Zha 2," which has already garnered $1.6 billion globally, including IMAX screenings.
items.contentSnippet: Aiding IMAX's lofty box office goals is the Chinese title "Ne Zha 2," which has already garnered $1.6 billion globally, including IMAX screenings.

items.title: Shortage of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy and Ozempic drugs is resolved, FDA says
items.content: The FDA's decision will threaten the ability of compounding pharmacies to make far cheaper, unbranded versions of the injections over the next few months.
items.contentSnippet: The FDA's decision will threaten the ability of compounding pharmacies to make far cheaper, unbranded versions of the injections over the next few months.

items.title: Yankees throw out one of baseball's most notorious traditions: Players can now grow beards
items.content: For the first time in nearly 50 years, the New York Yankees are allowing players to grow "well-groomed beards."
items.contentSnippet: For the first time in nearly 50 years, the New York Yankees are allowing players to grow "well-groomed beards."

items.title: The family-office gold rush is spurring a conference craze — with one notable comeback
items.content: There are 244 family-office conferences set for this year alone, per Dakota Marketplace. Amid the gold rush, one event organizer has seemingly made a comeback.
items.contentSnippet: There are 244 family-office conferences set for this year alone, per Dakota Marketplace. Amid the gold rush, one event organizer has seemingly made a comeback.

items.title: Home sales drop sharply as prices hit an all-time high for January
items.content: The median price of a home sold in January was $396,900, up 4.8% from the year before and the highest price ever for the month of January.
items.contentSnippet: The median price of a home sold in January was $396,900, up 4.8% from the year before and the highest price ever for the month of January.

items.title: Rivian beats Wall Street's fourth-quarter expectations, but expects lower deliveries in 2025
items.content: Rivian beat Wall Street's fourth-quarter earnings expectations and achieved its first gross quarterly profit but is forecasting lower sales in 2025.
items.contentSnippet: Rivian beat Wall Street's fourth-quarter earnings expectations and achieved its first gross quarterly profit but is forecasting lower sales in 2025.

items.title: Trump is 'not happy' with Boeing over Air Force One delays, but airlines are growing upbeat
items.content: President Trump has expressed frustration about delays of new Air Force One aircraft from Boeing.
items.contentSnippet: President Trump has expressed frustration about delays of new Air Force One aircraft from Boeing.

items.title: Walmart shares drop as retailer says profit growth will slow
items.content: Walmart has factors that could work in its favor, including a growing online business and market share gains from higher-income shoppers.
items.contentSnippet: Walmart has factors that could work in its favor, including a growing online business and market share gains from higher-income shoppers.

items.title: ESPN plans to add user-generated content to upcoming 'flagship' streaming service
items.content: ESPN plans to add user-generated content features in its upcoming streaming application, which will cost either $25 or $30 per month, sources say.
items.contentSnippet: ESPN plans to add user-generated content features in its upcoming streaming application, which will cost either $25 or $30 per month, sources say.

items.title: Amazon to gain creative control of James Bond franchise from Broccoli family
items.content: Amazon reached a deal with the Broccoli family, the James Bond franchise's longstanding producers, to form a new joint venture.
items.contentSnippet: Amazon reached a deal with the Broccoli family, the James Bond franchise's longstanding producers, to form a new joint venture.

items.title: Hasbro says it's taking steps to offset China tariff effects
items.content: Toy and gaming giant Hasbro is shifting manufacturing away from China as it eyes the effects of U.S. tariffs.
items.contentSnippet: Toy and gaming giant Hasbro is shifting manufacturing away from China as it eyes the effects of U.S. tariffs.

items.title: From pills to new uses, here's what Eli Lilly’s top scientist sees as the future of weight loss drugs
items.content: Eli Lilly Chief Scientific Officer Dan Skovronsky spoke to CNBC about obesity pills and more on the future of weight loss.
items.contentSnippet: Eli Lilly Chief Scientific Officer Dan Skovronsky spoke to CNBC about obesity pills and more on the future of weight loss.

items.title: Eli Lilly aims to invest in 'big problems hiding in plain sight' using obesity windfall
items.content: Eli Lilly wants to take big swings in Alzheimer's, ALS, chronic pain and other difficult diseases after its success in obesity.
items.contentSnippet: Eli Lilly wants to take big swings in Alzheimer's, ALS, chronic pain and other difficult diseases after its success in obesity.

items.title: Walmart is getting a bump from a surprising cohort: Wealthier shoppers
items.content: The discounter has shaken up its image with store remodels, faster deliveries and a wider mix of brands on its website.
items.contentSnippet: The discounter has shaken up its image with store remodels, faster deliveries and a wider mix of brands on its website.

items.title: UnitedHealthcare is offering buyouts to employees in benefits unit, could pursue layoffs, sources say
items.content: If UnitedHealthcare does not meet a resignation quota through buyouts, it will lay off employees, two people familiar with the matter said.
items.contentSnippet: If UnitedHealthcare does not meet a resignation quota through buyouts, it will lay off employees, two people familiar with the matter said.

items.title: Forever 21 is in talks with liquidators, indicating it's struggling to find a buyer
items.content: Forever 21 once dominated the fast fashion industry, but as Shein and Temu continue to take market share, it has failed to adapt to the new landscape.
items.contentSnippet: Forever 21 once dominated the fast fashion industry, but as Shein and Temu continue to take market share, it has failed to adapt to the new landscape.

items.title: San Francisco 49ers explore 10% minority stake sale at about $9 billion valuation
items.content: The San Francisco 49ers are the latest NFL team to consider a minority stake sale to private equity or other investors.
items.contentSnippet: The San Francisco 49ers are the latest NFL team to consider a minority stake sale to private equity or other investors.

items.title: Carvana expects another 'strong' year after topping fourth-quarter expectations
items.content: Carvana topped Wall Street's top- and bottom-line expectations for the fourth quarter, while guiding for another "strong" year in 2025.
items.contentSnippet: Carvana topped Wall Street's top- and bottom-line expectations for the fourth quarter, while guiding for another "strong" year in 2025.

items.title: Government travel has 'fallen off' since Trump inauguration, United Airlines says
items.content: Government travel makes up about 2% of United's business, Chief Financial Officer Mike Leskinen said.
items.contentSnippet: Government travel makes up about 2% of United's business, Chief Financial Officer Mike Leskinen said.

items.title: JetBlue talking to 'multiple airlines' about a new partnership
items.content: Federal judges blocked JetBlue's partnership with American Airlines and later a planned purchase of Spirit Airlines.
items.contentSnippet: Federal judges blocked JetBlue's partnership with American Airlines and later a planned purchase of Spirit Airlines.

items.title: Aviation industry urges Congress to approve emergency air traffic control funding
items.content: Their letter came three weeks after a deadly collision between a regional jet and an Army helicopter near Washington, D.C.
items.contentSnippet: Their letter came three weeks after a deadly collision between a regional jet and an Army helicopter near Washington, D.C.

items.title: Embattled EV maker Nikola files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection
items.content: Nikola – a once popular auto startup of investors – filed for bankruptcy protection after failing to secure a buyer or raise additional funds.
items.contentSnippet: Nikola – a once popular auto startup of investors – filed for bankruptcy protection after failing to secure a buyer or raise additional funds.

items.title: Hims & Hers to offer at-home blood draws, lean into 'peptide innovations' with new acquisitions
items.content: The startup is expanding its services less than one year after it started offering compounded GLP-1 weight loss drugs.
items.contentSnippet: The startup is expanding its services less than one year after it started offering compounded GLP-1 weight loss drugs.

items.title: KFC moves U.S. headquarters from Kentucky to Texas
items.content: KFC's parent company Yum Brands is calling remote workers back to the office.
items.contentSnippet: KFC's parent company Yum Brands is calling remote workers back to the office.

items.title: U.S. homebuilders raise alarm over tariffs as sentiment falls to 5-month low
items.content: Sales expectations in the next six months took a major hit in the National Association of Home Builders' Housing Market Index.
items.contentSnippet: Sales expectations in the next six months took a major hit in the National Association of Home Builders' Housing Market Index.

items.title: Nike teams up with Kim Kardashian shapewear brand Skims as it looks to reach more women
items.content: Nike's decision to partner with Skims comes as it looks to claw back market share and return to growth under new CEO Elliott Hill.
items.contentSnippet: Nike's decision to partner with Skims comes as it looks to claw back market share and return to growth under new CEO Elliott Hill.

items.title: High-cost sickle cell gene therapies push insurers and Medicaid programs to find new payment models
items.content: The high cost of sickle cell gene therapies is pushing private insurers and Medicaid programs to develop new payment models.
items.contentSnippet: The high cost of sickle cell gene therapies is pushing private insurers and Medicaid programs to develop new payment models.

items.title: Coca-Cola takes on Olipop and Poppi with new prebiotic soda brand, Simply Pop
items.content: The U.S. prebiotic soda category has more than doubled over the last five years.
